snippet.title: Piko Interactive Arcade 1 - Evercade Cartridge Tour
snippet.description:
Captured directly off the Evercade VS. All of the games you're about to see are those you have never even heard of, so this is going to be a treat.

Games:
00:15 - Burglar X
08:19 - Diver Boy
13:12 - Dragon Master
18:25 - Fancy World: Earth of Crisis
25:56 - Magic Purple
32:47 - Master's Fury
35:29 - Steel Force
40:10 - The Legend of Silkroad
43:29 - Ultimate Tennis
